SELECT * FROM PURPOSE_CONTENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND PURPOSE_IDX = #{purposeIdx}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, TO_CHAR(P.CREATED_AT,'YYYY.MM') AS CREATED_AT, PI.PRODUCT_SFILE_NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_IDX = PI.PRODUCT_IDX
AND P.CATEGORY_IDX IN (2, 3)
AND P.CATEGORY_IDX = #{requestBody.computerType}
AND P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{requestBody.listSearch}||'%'
OREDER BY PRICE DESC
OREDER BY PRICE ASC
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{recordSize} ROWS ONLY
